lrc.lyric:
[by:我姓chan]
[00:00]Hide all the keys and seal our windows
[00:04]'Cause I'm going to war
[00:08]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[00:11]'Cause I may never come home
[00:14]Hide all the keys and seal our windows
[00:19]'Cause I'm going to war
[00:22]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[00:25]'Cause I may never come home
[00:28]No I may never come home
[00:47]Hide all the keys and seal our windows
[00:52]'Cause I'm going to war
[00:54]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[00:58]'Cause I may never come home
[01:02]Leave all your bags and head for the water
[01:06]Chase the lies into sea
[01:10]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[01:13]'Cause I may never come home
[01:16]No I may never come home
[01:20]'Cause I may never come home
[01:23]No I may never come home
[01:26]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[01:28]'Cause I may never come home
[01:31]No I may never come home
[01:35]I may never come home
[01:38]No I may never come home
[01:41]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[01:43]'Cause I may never come home
[01:45]No home
[01:49]No home
[01:53]No home
[01:57]No home
[02:00]No
[02:01]I hear a train that'll take me some place
[02:05]Farther from the shore
[02:08]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[02:12]'Cause the ocean needs you more
[02:15]Leave all your bags and head for the water
[02:19]Chase the lies into sea
[02:23]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[02:27]'Cause I may never come home
[02:29]No I may never come home
[02:34]I may never come home
[02:37]No I may never come home
[02:41]I may never come home
[02:45]No I may never come home
[02:46]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[02:49]'Cause I may never come home
[02:51]No I may never come home
[02:55]No home
[02:59]No home
[03:03]No home
[03:06]No home
[03:10]No I may never come home
[03:13]No I may never come home
[03:17]No I may never come home
[03:21]No I may never come home
[03:31]One hundred men raise your heads up
[03:37]'Cause we're going to war
[03:39]Open your eyes and steady your hands
[03:43]'Cause we may never come home
[03:46]Hide all the keys and seal our windows
[03:51]'Cause I'm going to war
[03:54]Don't hold your breath waiting for me
[03:58]'Cause I won't ever come home
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Elliot Denenberg
[00:00.00] 作词 : Elliot Denenberg

tlyric.lyric:
[by:我姓chan]
[00:00]把钥匙藏起来，把窗户钉死
[00:04]因为我将去参加战争
[00:08]请不要屏息等待我
[00:11]因为我可能再也无法回家
[00:14]把钥匙藏起来，窗户封死
[00:19]我将赴前线迎敌
[00:22]请别屏息等待我
[00:25]因为我可能战死沙场
[00:28]也没有办法保护你
[00:47]把钥匙藏好，窗户遮蔽
[00:52]因为我将去浴血奋战
[00:54]请不要屏息待我
[00:58]因为我可能一去不返
[01:02]你可以独自一人，去海边
[01:06]把谎言扔进海里
[01:10]千万不许屏息待我
[01:13]可能我将效死疆场
[01:16]一去不返
[01:20]或许有去无回
[01:23]或许命在旦夕
[01:26]所以不要屏息待我
[01:28]我不会再回来
[01:31]没法再见到你
[01:35]不能再看到你
[01:38]因为我不会回家了
[01:41]请不要屏息待我
[01:43]我大概不会回来了
[01:45]我已没有家
[01:49]已没有家了
[01:53]没有家了
[01:57]没有了
[02:00]没了
[02:01]我听到汽笛的轰鸣，它将待我奔赴战场
[02:05]去那离海边更远的地方
[02:08]请不要屏息以待我
[02:12]你应该去海边玩耍
[02:15]带上我的谎言，去海边
[02:19]把他们扔进海里
[02:23]千万不要屏息待我
[02:27]我可能不会归家
[02:29]战死沙场
[02:34]再也见不到你
[02:37]是的，不会再回来了
[02:41]或许永远不会
[02:45]永远
[02:46]所以不要屏息待我
[02:49]我不会再回家
[02:51]请你忘了我
[02:55]我没有家了
[02:59]没有家了
[03:03]没有了
[03:06]没了
[03:10]也不会回家了
[03:13]不会回来看你
[03:17]我将战死沙场
[03:21]马革裹尸
[03:31]一百个男人抬起了头
[03:37]坚毅地奔赴战场
[03:39]睁开你的眼睛，再看我一眼
[03:43]因为我们可能不会回来了
[03:46]锁好门窗
[03:51]因为我要奔赴战场了
[03:54]请不要屏息以待我
[03:58]我永远都不会回来了，不见
